TopicTitle: I should thank the inventor who built MP4

Articles.Content:
I should thank the inventors who built video player built-in mobile phone They saved my from hospital boredom

I was just returned from Hospital, i was there from yesterday until today i was tested for Lidocaine i'm allergic and my dentist want the test as precaution , i hate being treated as needle cushion.

Now i can go to dentist, hate go there

Returning to the topic I remembered that my Sony Xperia J has plenty of free space on the internal memory, it is also loaded it films.

I downloaded NASAflix movie about Russian Space Program, one about Apollo 17 and the best one Star Trek 2013 and Audiobook, it's saved my from boredom, i only wish to battery lasted longer.

Just because they perform multiple functions does not mean they do them well. My current phone runs dry using the camera in about 20 minutes.

I miss the days when I could get 3-4 days on a single charge.
